name: Inspectlet – User Session Recording and Heatmaps
author: Inspectlet

sections.description:
Official plugin for Inspectlet Analytics (www.inspectlet.com)

Watch visitors use your website. Discover where visitors are getting confused on your site and what’s getting their attention. See every mouse movement, scrolling, clicks, and typing on your site.

Use eye-tracking heatmaps to see where your visitors are looking and what parts of the site they’re reading by visualizing their mouse movements.
sections.installation:
1. Upload inspectlet-for-wordpress.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory on your server
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Under the new Inspectlet settings menu in the Admin dashboard, copy/paste your Inspectlet JS code you received at www.inspectlet.com
sections.faq:
How much does Inspectlet cost?

Inspectlet starts at free.

2.0

  • SECOND version of Inspectlet for WordPress!
